properties.markdownProperty:
Proteus uses pytest as testing framework. Test coverage report can be generated using `pytest-cov` tool. Use the following commands:
- `pytest --cov` generates test coverage report and show it in the command line interface.
- `pytest --cov --cov-report=html:coverage_re` generate a test coverage report and stores it as HTML. It can be found in `coverage_re` folder inside root directory. To see result, open the folder with the file explorer and open `index.html` file.
